record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - March 06, 2008)

[Page: H1349]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days within which to revise and extend their remarks and insert extraneous material on the bill, H.R. 2857, into the Record.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from California?
